8thLevelClericSpells.Name: Antimagic Field
8thLevelClericSpells.Description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse.

8thLevelClericSpells.Name: Control Weather
8thLevelClericSpells.Description: You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell.

8thLevelClericSpells.Name: Earthquake
8thLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

8thLevelClericSpells.Name: Holy Aura
8thLevelClericSpells.Description: Divine light washes out from you and coalesces in a soft radiance in a 30-foot radius around you.
